title: Great!
review: Really great movie! Acting is great, and the story is really entertaining. This was a really enjoyable, entertaining movie the whole way through.

title: Pretty epic.
review: Worlds collide in this Marvel epic. Great action, great characters, and a really great villain make this one stand out.

title: Not as fun as the original, but still great
review: I didn't enjoy this film NEARLY as much as the original, but it's very original and well-made. Another great film from a great director.

title: Amazing
review: Really fantastic movie. Pulls you in and doesn't let you go until the credits roll.

title: Amazing
review: This is one of the most beautiful movies I have ever seen. Not only that, but the music and plot are equally incredible. Fantastic movie.

movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: ARRRGGHHH IT GOT ME!
review: This movie got in my feels man. Amazing acting, great story, solid script. Great movie.

title: It's a classic
review: Don't have much to say about this movie. Classic, legendary musical.

title: Technically outstanding horror movie
review: Visual effects on this movie were excellent; some of the best I've ever seen in a horror movie. Unfortunately, most of the characters were really weak and one-dimensional. This movie is flawed, but kind of fantastic in its own way.

title: Extremely impressive on a technical level
review: It's amazing that this movie exists; a live action-animation hybrid that serves as a love letter to classic cartoons; both Bugs and Mickey. Very fun movie.

title: Epic space movie
review: Yo. This is an epic space movie. Very cool effects.

title: Absolutely brutal
review: This movie is hard to watch. Brutal, but really fantastic.

title: Very cool
review: This movie is very cool. Great action and animation.

title: Dark, funny, fun
review: It's a Tarantino movie; what did you expect! This one is a lot of fun.

movie_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
title: Great movie!
review: Easily one of the best modern Star Wars movies. Just... really good.

title: It's alright
review: Not great, not terrible. Captain Marvel lives in an ugly grey area. Still, this movie really isn't bad.

title: Dark and unforgettable
review: This movie gave me nightmares as a kid. As an older kid, it didn't scare me as much, but it's still really freaking creepy. Excellent animation and the insane plot make this one unforgettable for me.

title: Pretty great movie
review: I like this movie a good bit. The story is well-made and complex, and the movie deserves credit for that alone. This is a well-crafted Disney movie that's a must-see for people who love animated movies.

title: Very good
review: Basically nothing happens in this movie. It's entirely character-based with virtually no plot. Even so, it's very funny and very profound. Very good.

title: Amazing
review: This movie is amazing. It does so much with so little, and it's really, really impressive. This one never gets old.

title: I loved this movie!
review: Easily the second best movie of 2019, in my books at least. This movie is extremely entertaining, and really awesome. I loved it.

title: Great movie - kind of long though
review: Excellent acting, directing, plot, script, and all that stuff. The last 40 minutes felt more like 2 hours though.

title: Very good
review: This is far from the best movie I've ever seen, but it was still very good.

title: Great movie!
review: This is an important movie. It's not really fun, or something I would frequently watch, but it is very important. It's very well-made and we'll-acted.

title: Tons of fun
review: This is a ridiculous movie, and it's a ton a fun. Not an original bone in its body, with terrible CGI. Still, I kind of love it.

title: Really pleasant.
review: Very nice, pleasant movie. Not the best, but still really good.

title: Flawed and fantastic
review: This is an amazing superhero movie. It bites off way more than it can chew, but it's really entertaining and fun every time.

title: Super fun.
review: This movie is a blast. It's also one of the best Marvel movies from a visual standpoint. Puts the other Thor movies to shame!

title: Not bad
review: This movie is not bad. It's not great, but it has plenty to like.

title: Very cool.
review: This movie... is cool. That's pretty much all I got.

title: Awesome movie
review: Awesome movie from a visual perspective. Story-wise and character-wise, it's flawed. Still, this is a pretty awesome movie.

title: Pretty great
review: Honestly, this movie is really, really great. Great cinematography and stuff. Some parts hit REALLY hard.

title: Fresh new Spider-man
review: This film does many things very, very well. It is a purposeful small film, and it's all the better for it.

movie_title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
title: Weird, funny, insane
review: I've never seen a movie like this one. Dark, funny, and very strange, the appropriately named Dr. Strangelove is a classic.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
title: Great movie, but it does have flaws
review: The third Star Wars film in the original trilogy is a great movie, but it is still flawed.

title: This movie is something else
review: This movie is wack. Very weird, but still very good.

title: Ugly animation; smart script
review: Not a super great movie, but there's something special here. The script and story are clever and intriguing. The characters are likable. Second half is much better than the first half

title: Amazing
review: This is a masterpiece. Beautiful, bleak, and dark, Taxi Driver is a classic. Scorsese at his absolute best.

title: Freaking awesome
review: This is one of the most enjoyable, entertaining, and profound movies I've ever seen. Enough said.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Not bad man!
review: This movie is actually kind of great! Really entertaining and interesting from start to finish!

title: It's good, but don't get your prop in a twist
review: Not the best movie ever made people. This thing is flawed, but also kind of magical and amazing. Worth watching, but not the best thing ever.

title: Light and fun
review: This is a very light, fun Marvel movie with a great lead performance by Rudd. I really like it.

title: Stupid and awesome
review: This film is a ton of fun. Really stupid, but really funny and entertaining.

title: Pretty great for the most part!
review: The beginning and ending are slow, but the whole middle section is really, really interesting and entertaining. Very good movie.

title: Great movie!
review: This movie had me on the edge of my seat from start to finish. Excellent acting, with a really interesting plot. One of the director's best movies.

title: Visually stunning
review: One of the best movies ever in terms of visuals. This movie looks AMAZING. Like, every shot is fantastic. This is a must-see for animation fans.

title: Overrated
review: This film; it's alright. Not bad, but hardly as amazing as many claim it is.

title: An instant animated classic
review: I freaking love this movie. The script is one of the most clever, funny, and sharp I've ever heard. The animation and voice-acting are great.This movie feels like an instant classic, and is one of my all-time favorite animated movies.

title: High-quality Marvel film
review: Up there with the best Marvel movies, Civil War is huge and epic. This movie was as ambitious as an Avengers movie, and unlike Age of Ultron, this one really delivered. Go see it if you love Marvel.

title: Magical
review: Totally original film. I've never seen anything like this. Really, really amazing.

title: Mildly entertaining
review: This movie had some really funny moments, but I can't say that it's a great movie.

title: Great movie.
review: Emotional, complicated, and childish; Inside Out is a really impressive movie. Even so, it's not the best movie I've ever seen. 8/10.

title: Great movie
review: Not as good as Infinity War, but still a very satisfying conclusion to a lengthy, beloved franchise. Lots of great laughs and awesome moments.

title: Very good, but didn't have to exist
review: This movie didn't have to be made. With that being said, it's still a quality film. The animation is great, it's got plenty of really funny moments, and lots of heart. This is the worst movie in the series, but it's still great.

title: Really great movie with less-than-great script
review: The title of this review says it all. Wreck-it-Ralph is a really great movie. (Most) of the characters are great, the video game world is extremely well-made, and this movie really has some strong emotion to it. The plot is really good for the most part.The script, however, is less-good. There are plenty of cringey lines and jokes throughout this movie. Besides that, I love this movie.

title: Classic
review: This movie is hilarious, extremely entertaining, and very quotable. I love it.

title: Extremely impressive
review: What a movie! This movie is exhilarating. The excitement never ends. Extremely well-crafted, with awesome characters, jokes, and action. One of the greatest endings I've ever seen in a movie.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Great, but very long
review: Great acting and set pieces and stuff. Just... kind of long and somewhat pointless. Plot doesn't really get started until halfway through the movie. Still, this movie is something special.

title: Very smart, well-made horror movie.
review: Jordan Peele's directorial debut is really really good! This movie has great acting, a crazy (yet very cohesive) plot, and plenty of strong laugh-out-loud moments. More entertaining than scary, but it's REALLY entertaining.

title: Good movie; bad script
review: The acting and emotional power of the movie are great, but the script has some serious problems. Parts feel extremely unrealistic and goofy. Still, not a bad movie.

movie_title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
title: Truly amazing
review: I've seen this movie many times, and I am comfortable calling it my all-time favorite movie. The music, cinematography, acting, script, characters, and plot are all near-perfect. This movie never gets old. It's beautiful, uplifting, inspiring, and all-around amazing. I LOVE this movie.

title: Amazing
review: This film is outstanding in every possible way. Just perfect. You have to watch it at least once.

title: One of my all-time fav movies
review: I love everything about this movie. Extremely well-made in every way, and tons of fun.

title: Great horror movie!
review: What really makes this movie stand out is it's heartwarming focus on family and it's gimmick. The whole 'you have to be quiet or the monsters get you' gimmick is followed to the highest degree. This is an original, well-made, entertaining horror movie.

title: It's good
review: I really don't understand the hype for this movie. It's good; not the best thing ever.

title: Great movie!
review: The message about family in this one is really, really heartwarming, touching, and good. Animation is great. Only issue with this one is that it feels kind of familiar. Still, this is another great Pixar movie!

title: Really really good
review: I don't really care for war movies. With that being said, 1917 was really great. Epic cinematography makes this film feel very original and special. Would recommend to any war-movie lover.

title: Stop-motion classic
review: A very dark, unforgettable, impeccably-animated movie. Another movie that I never really get tired of watching.

title: Devastating
review: Don't watch this movie. It's the most dark, depressing, amazing movie ever. Truly one of the best films ever made.

title: One of Marvel's finest achievements
review: Probably THE most fun, creative, and entertaining Marvel movie. This one doesn't have a dull moment, with great visuals, a great cast, and great characters. This is easily one of the best Marvel movies.

title: Funny and entertaining
review: Just like the original Shrek, the sequel is really funny, well-written, and smart. It's a ton of fun.

title: Ridiculously fun
review: This is the most fun, entertaining action film I've ever seen. Nuff said.

title: Well-acres and ambitious BUT
review: This movie has problems. The biggest one is that it's just totally ridiculous. It literally makes so sense.

title: Weird as frick.
review: Very good movie, but you don't have to like it. It's insane.

title: Best superhero movie ever
review: AMAZING MOVIE. This is easily one of the best movies ever made. Totally awesome in every single way. Just... watch it already. You won't regret it.

title: Darn-near unwatchable; classic
review: I'm EXTREMELY conflicted about this movie. I hate it, but it's amazing. I won't ever watch it again, but it's groundbreaking. I can't recommend it, but you have to see it.

title: Animated classic
review: This one never gets old. Extremely creative and fun to watch. Excellent start to an excellent series.

movie_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
title: Not bad
review: This movie is overrated as heck. Still, it's not terrible. I HATE the ending, so much. Great acting, especially by Jim Carrey.

title: Meh
review: It's too long. Really overrated. Honestly wasn't super impressed.

title: Better than the original...
review: Which should be impossible, as the original is pretty amazing. Extremely impressive and always entertaining.

title: WE STUCK IN LA LA LAND
review: Awesome movie. Easily one of the greatest musicals ever made. Deserves every bit of the hype. Go watch this movie.

title: Beautiful and horrifying
review: This movie is both beautiful and chilling. Amazing acting by the lead. Just watch this movie.

title: Entertaining classic
review: This is one of those movies that don't ever get old. Always fun and entertaining.

title: Amazing fun
review: This is one of my favorite movies. It's ridiculously fun, every single time I watch it. I love this movie, stupid and all.

title: Over-the-top and excellent
review: This, is the best Tarantino film. It's funny, entertaining, extremely well-acted, and surprisingly profound and meaningful. This is a truly unique, special movie.

title: Not bad at all.
review: Not a bad movie. Has plenty of heart and funny moments, but also it's fair share of flaws. If you like horror-comedies, give this one a shot.

title: It's a wonderful movie
review: Honestly, this movie deserves all the praise it gets. Extremely wholesome, and very very good.

title: Brilliant
review: This movie is something else. Long, brutal, and terrible. This one will go down in the history books.

title: One of the best films of the decade
review: Watching this movie is an experience. A breathtaking, horrible, dark, depressing, powerful experience.It's a classic in my books.

title: Fan-freaking-tastic!
review: One of the best movies ever. Crazy awesome. Gripping. Exhilarating. Honestly, just a really great movie.

title: Very cool
review: This is a really cool movie! It's not deep or complex, but it's visually great and a lot of fun.

title: Puts other action movies to shame
review: Awesome movie. Action is fantastic. Ending is one of the best. Always entertaining.

title: One of the best films ever made
review: Absolutely amazing. Everything about this film is great. Honestly one of the best movies ever made.

title: Awesome
review: Super well-made and extremely interesting from start to finish. This is a really special movie.

title: It's good.
review: This movie... is overrated. It's a great movie, don't get me wrong, but it is NOT the greatest movie ever made. Still, definitely worth a watch.

title: What the WHAT?!?!
review: Crazy movie. Really, really original, entertaining, and shocking. I walked out of the theatre very impressed. Easily one of the best films of 2019.

title: Kind of amazing
review: I like this movie. A lot. Really weird and interesting. Has flaws, but is still really impressive in its own way.

movie_title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
title: Huge, epic, ambitious, near-perfect.
review: Phenomenal movie. I heard that it was good, but this movie was way better than I could have imagined. If you live movies, this is a must-watch.

title: Very well-acted, powerful movie.
review: It's hard to describe the best things about this movie with words. The thing that really carries this film are the script and lead performances by Scarlett Johansson and Adam Driver. I didn't even know Johansson was a great actress until I saw this movie! They both convey emotion very profoundly, and make their characters feel very real. Excellent movie.

title: Animated classic
review: Brad Bird does it again. This is an excellent film that never gets old.

title: Very original and entertaining
review: Best word to describe this movie is entertaining. This movie is really dang fun! Not the best movie by any means, but plenty of good, laugh-out-loud fun.

title: One of the best Marvel Movies
review: Really, really great movie. Marvel kicked off the MCU on the best foot possible. This film is awesome, entertaining, and very well-made.

title: Great movie!
review: Great, great, great movie! Really good all the way through, with a really great villain.

title: One of the best Anderson films
review: This movie is original and amazing in every way possible. I want to watch it just thinking about it.

title: One of the greatest films ever made
review: This one is a classic. Fantastic in every way. Never gets old.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
title: Sci-Fi Masterpiece
review: This is the best so I-fi film ever made. An extremely well-made classic that is incredible in every way.

title: Best movie about racism that I've seen
review: This movie is multi-layered, funny, and deeply moving. A movie about social class and racism, told in a unique, fresh way. This is a truly amazing movie.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
title: Amazing sequel
review: While the first Star Wars film was revolutionary and groundbreaking, the second is simply amazing in ever way. This is a fantastic movie.

title: Disney Classic!
review: Fan-freaking-tactic Disney Classic. Great animation, voice acting, characters, and story. This one never gets old.

title: Amazing action, mediocre story
review: Really not much Not day about this movie. Some of the best action scenes ever, but the story is extremely thin.

title: Wild, original, and extremely entertaining
review: This movie is insanely funny, but it's also deep and thought-provoking at the same time. This movie is a paradox; an awesome cinematic paradox.

title: Amazing movie
review: One of the best movies of the decade! Oscar-worthy performances by the leads, an extremely sharp script, and a never-boring plot make this movie stand out. Here is one for the history books.

title: Epic
review: This movie is freaking epic. More violence and action than The Godfather; I loved this movie.

title: Horrid classic
review: This movie is way more thrilling than it has any right to be.

title: Amazing
review: This movie is amazing. Visually and narratively rich, but very heavy at the same time. Really, really great.

title: Legendary
review: This movie is legendary. Amazing for its time, and still amazing. The Wizard of Oz is easily one of the best book-to- film adaptions ever made.

title: Really darn cool
review: This, is a cool movie. Matt Damon kills it. Always interesting.

movie_title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
title: Not good!
review: This movie, is not good! It's just... not as funny as it thinks it is, or tries to be. The only good things about this movie are the two lead actors (hard to not like them) and one really funny scene (that I won't spoil).
